title: Grown Ups (2011)(Eng-Fra audio)(4 subs)(DD5.1)(DVD9) TBS
description:
Grown Ups (2011)(Eng-Fra audio)(4 subs)(DD5.1) TBS       

*****RELEASE 4 januari 2011***** 
  
Verenigde Staten
Komedie
102 minuten

geregisseerd door Dennis Dugan
met Adam Sandler, Kevin James en Chris Rock

Vijf goede vrienden en teammaten hebben elkaar sinds hun middelbare school niet meer gezien. Om hun overleden basketbalcoach te herdenken besluiten ze, 35 

jaar later tijdens het '4th of July' weekend, allemaal nog eens bij elkaar te komen. Ze ontdekken al snel dat ze allemaal erg veranderd zijn in die 35 jaar.

Storyline

In 1978, five 12-year-olds win a CYO basketball championship. Thirty years later, they gather with their families for their coach's funeral and a weekend at 

a house on a lake where they used to party. By now, each is a grownup with problems and challenges: Marcus is alone and drinks too much. Rob, with three 

daughters he rarely sees, is always deeply in love until he turns on his next ex-wife. Eric is overweight and out of work. Kurt is a househusband, henpecked 

by wife and mother-in-law. Lenny is a successful Hollywood agent married to a fashion designer; their kids take privilege for granted. Can the outdoors help 

these grownups rediscover connections or is this chaos in the making?
